name: available-certificates

mkey.description: Check if specific certificate is available.

find_all_references.description: Include reference counts across all VDOMs when scope is global.

GET.summary:
Get available certificates.
Access Group: any

exists.name: exists
exists.title: Exists
exists.description: True when the certificate file exists.

is_ssl_server_cert.name: is_ssl_server_cert
is_ssl_server_cert.title: Is SSL Server Cert
is_ssl_server_cert.description: True when the purpose of this certificate is for use in an SSL server.

is_ssl_client_cert.name: is_ssl_client_cert
is_ssl_client_cert.title: Is SSL Client Cert
is_ssl_client_cert.description: True when the purpose of this certificate is for use in an SSL client.

is_proxy_ssl_cert.name: is_proxy_ssl_cert
is_proxy_ssl_cert.title: Is Proxy SSL Cert
is_proxy_ssl_cert.description: True when the certificate is used as an SSL proxy certificate.

is_general_allowable_cert.name: is_general_allowable_cert
is_general_allowable_cert.title: Is General Allowable Certificate
is_general_allowable_cert.description: True when the certificate is generally allowable.

is_default_local.name: is_default_local
is_default_local.title: Is Default Local
is_default_local.description: True when the certificate is one of the default local certificates.

is_built_in.name: is_built_in
is_built_in.title: Is Built In
is_built_in.description: True when the certificate is built in.

is_wifi_cert.name: is_wifi_cert
is_wifi_cert.title: Is WiFi Certificate
is_wifi_cert.description: True when the certificate is a WiFi only certificate.

is_deep_inspection_cert.name: is_deep_inspection_cert
is_deep_inspection_cert.title: Is Deep Inspection Certificate
is_deep_inspection_cert.description: True when the certificate is available for deep inspections.

trusted.name: trusted
trusted.title: Certificate Authority Trusted
trusted.description: True when the certificate authority is trusted.

has_valid_cert_key.name: has_valid_cert_key
has_valid_cert_key.title: Has Valid Certificate Key
has_valid_cert_key.description: True when the certificate has a valid key.

saml_sig_algo_supported.name: saml_sig_algo_supported
saml_sig_algo_supported.title: Algorithm Is Allowed for SAML
saml_sig_algo_supported.description: True when the certificate can be used as an IdP certificate.

revoked_serials.name: revoked_serials
revoked_serials.title: Revoked Serials
revoked_serials.description: A list of revoked serial numbers.

key_type.name: key_type
key_type.title: Key Type
key_type.description: The type of key for the certificate.

key_size.name: key_size
key_size.title: Key Size
key_size.description: The size of the key for the certificate.

is_local_ca_cert.name: is_local_ca_cert
is_local_ca_cert.title: Is Local Certificate CA
is_local_ca_cert.description: True when the local certificate is a CA certificate.

lastupdate.name: lastupdate
lastupdate.title: CRL Last Update
lastupdate.description: Timestamp of when the CRL was last updated, in seconds.

nextupdate.name: nextupdate
nextupdate.title: CRL Next Update
nextupdate.description: Number of seconds until the next update for this CRL.

lastupdate_raw.name: lastupdate_raw
lastupdate_raw.title: CRL Last Update Raw
lastupdate_raw.description: Raw last update date string from the certificate data.

nextupdate_raw.name: nextupdate_raw
nextupdate_raw.title: CRL Next Update Raw
nextupdate_raw.description: Raw next update date string from the certificate data.

valid_from.name: valid_from
valid_from.title: Valid From
valid_from.description: Timestamp of the validity start date, in seconds.

valid_to.name: valid_to
valid_to.title: Valid To
valid_to.description: Timestamp of the validity end date, in seconds.

valid_from_raw.name: valid_from_raw
valid_from_raw.title: Valid From Raw
valid_from_raw.description: Raw validity start date string from the certificate data.

valid_to_raw.name: valid_to_raw
valid_to_raw.title: Valid to Raw
valid_to_raw.description: Raw validity end date string from the certificate data.

signature_algorithm.name: signature_algorithm
signature_algorithm.title: Signature Algorithm
signature_algorithm.description: Hashing algorithm used for the signature.

subject_raw.name: subject_raw
subject_raw.title: Subject Raw
subject_raw.description: Raw subject string from certificate data.

issuer_raw.name: issuer_raw
issuer_raw.title: Issuer Raw
issuer_raw.description: Raw contents of the certificate's issuer field.

is_ca.name: is_ca
is_ca.title: Is CA
is_ca.description: True when the certificate is a root certificate authority.

serial_number.name: serial_number
serial_number.title: Serial Number
serial_number.description: The serial number of the certificate.

q_path.name: q_path
q_path.title: CMDB Path
q_path.description: The CMDB path the certificate entry belongs to.

q_name.name: q_name
q_name.title: CMDB Name
q_name.description: The CMDB name the certificate entry belongs to.

q_ref.name: q_ref
q_ref.title: References
q_ref.description: The CMDB reference count for this certificate.

q_static.name: q_static
q_static.title: Static
q_static.description: True when the certificate is a static CMDB entry.

acme_status.name: acme_status
acme_status.title: ACME Status
acme_status.description: Status of the ACME certificate job.

response_description: Retrieve a list of certificates, certificate revocation lists, and certificate authorities.

mkey.name: mkey
mkey.summary: Check if specific certificate is available.

find_all_references.name: find_all_references
find_all_references.summary: Include reference counts across all VDOMs when scope is global.
